name: Tower
description: TowerSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) built on Berachain, enabling users to swap tokens seamlessly and efficiently. It offers a streamlined interface and supports deep liquidity for fast, low-slippage trades.

name: Escher
description: Escher Finance is a decentralized platform for liquid staking across multiple chains. It integrates with protocols like Babylon to enable secure, cross-chain staking. Users earn rewards through the ePoints system by participating in the ecosystem.
